Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Austin/Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North and Austin: due to, street blockage near Austin/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North, Austin and over regular route, due to street blockage near Austin/Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound 72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound #72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark. 

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/76th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Morgan, 74th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Morgan, 74th, Halsted and over regular route, due to street blockage near Halsted/76th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
